html:
4.16.21  10:16 am   what songs that you made have dream melodies???'

      only one of them has been recorded

4.16.21  9:45 am   im confused, what is the criteria for a text to be published either in the notebook section or in twitter, besides char length

      if i think it's good enough

4.16.21  8:44 am   How do you get yourself working when you aren't motivated?

      that would be impossible

4.16.21  6:26 am   What are you going to do?

      everything, if i have time

4.16.21  2:19 am   Hey Bill what should I write about?

      everything, if you have time

4.16.21  2:16 am   Why did the chicken cross the road?

      what my client (the chicken) and i are wondering is why was a road built across the chicken's path

4.15.21  11:34 pm   How many vowels does the title of your next song contain?

      6 but i may adjust the title

4.15.21  11:21 pm   do you record audio and video at the same time?

      for some things

4.15.21  11:06 pm   what have you been working on

      songs and videos

4.15.21  10:10 pm   Most categories on this website lead to a page called billwurtz.com/(category name).html or some variation on it like dropping the .html. For some reason, the "scarmble" category leads to a page called billwurtz.com/anagrams/anagrams.html instead of billwurtz.com/scarmble/scarmble.html, why?

      anagrams is what it actually is. but a lot of people don't know what 'anagram' means (a lot of people actually think it means acronym). so instead i've labeled it "scramble" except i've scrambled the letters slightly for 2 reasons: because it matches the style of many of the other categories, and also because it is relevant to that category itself. Also it's important to notice that none of the scrambled titles are ever scrambled when they appear in the URL. this is a decoration scheme which relies on the colors, and would not be done without the colors

4.15.21  8:45 pm   What role does collaboration play in your creative process?

      none

4.15.21  7:15 pm   What do you mean by associating words with chords?

      what do YOU mean by it

4.15.21  7:06 pm   How different in style is this new 2D video from your other 2D videos?

      it's similar to the ones from early 2014 or 2013

4.15.21  6:32 pm   I know the most effective strategy is melody before (or at the same time as) chords, but I have a hard time finding notes outside the major scale unless I predetermine a freaky chord and puzzle piece it in. Any advice for being more adventurous with melody?

      try throwing words into the game. this can allow concepts, ideas, and even stories, to drive the music and give it purpose. otherwise how the hell would any note be 'right' or 'wrong'?

4.15.21  4:57 pm   Did you briefly become a moth during Hello Sexy Pants?

      no

4.15.21  4:51 pm   How come all the planets are named after gods/goddesses except for earth?

      because all the other ones are in the sky

4.15.21  4:35 pm   When writing songs, do you work on the lyrics first or instrumentals first?

      no

4.15.21  4:29 pm   I wonder if your music will be seen as some of the all-time great stuff like Bach or Beatles. I think it will, do you?

      i'm doing the best i can. there is still room for a lot of improvement

4.15.21  3:51 pm   Are you gonna do another episode of "Wild Frolicking Adventures of Educational Information"? 

      yes

4.15.21  3:45 pm   Do you plan out the structure of a song before you write it?

      no

4.15.21  2:18 pm   was "i'm gonna change my ways, oh, and i'm leaving on a different plane" in "outside" a message that your videos will be 3d in the future?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

4.15.21  1:46 pm   Okay, so many of your songs have chord changes that are unique but don't sound out of place at all. Advice for anyone trying to do the same thing?

      my best trick for that is to spend almost all your waking hours at the keyboard for several years, trying to uncover the secrets of the universe. another weird trick, for the chords, is to get words involved. that actually helps steer the chords more onto their meaningful way

4.15.21  1:31 pm   what's your opinion on time travel

      time is required for travel. that is no secret. if you don't believe me, check what time it is and then go somewhere and check the time again

4.15.21  1:22 pm   how do you motivate yourself to spend all the hours you have to put in to get a project finished?

      it just depends on how bad you want it

4.15.21  12:58 pm   Can u write a song about what other planets with life might be like?

      i'm already doing the best i can, if you take pretty much any part of my songs that don't have specific earth-references. you would be left with just the life part

4.15.21  12:43 pm   If you had an unlimited amount of time would you make unlimited music or would you do some other things?

      make unlimited music AND do other things

4.15.21  12:20 pm   what is music

      like a reflection of you, but not a reflection. actual

4.15.21  10:41 am   What is your favourite swear word?

      but

4.15.21  10:20 am   You had ether in the songs section or the expert mode section a song called `I am vacationing in the middle of the sun` was commented out in the html.

     that's not a song

     Are you still working on it or was that an alternate name to `Here comes the sun`.

     that was a satirical description of what the hell may have happened to me in the later half of 2019 and earlier half of 2020

4.15.21  9:00 am   When will you have other other other categories?

      pretty soon. there's a lot more categories i have to add

4.15.21  7:15 am   Does the title of the next song contain the word the

      no

4.15.21  5:11 am   how many times will you mention "finance" or "finances" in your next song?

      it never uses the word finance

4.15.21  3:55 am   what do I need to do to be more creative?

      stop expecting to be creative at every single moment. but, on the other hand, do expect to be wildly creative at some moments which you will never predict. as soon as you begin to accept that the non-creative moments really do belong there, that's when the creative moments will probably start to roar at their hardest

4.14.21  11:32 pm   Do you you intend any meaning in your songs? be it the short short ones or you long ones,  but do/did you ever intend meanings in any of your songs?

     yes

4.14.21  9:58 pm   people keep asking about 3d videos and 2d videos, but i ask: have you ever considered 1d videos???

      hell yeah. that's the whole way i got started

4.14.21  8:32 pm   let me get this straight... you have a basket to catch the ideas, and a bucket to catch the dreams?

      no. i used to say 'bucket' for the idea question on the questions page, but, after writing and releasing a song which depicts buckets catching things, i changed my questions page answer to something different, so as not to get confused or conflated with that particular song and distract from the question

4.14.21  7:11 pm   Why try if I'm just gonna fail?

      because you're also gonna succeed

4.14.21  6:57 pm   But seriously, how do you know what key something is in??

      i'm not sure. it's like knowing which way is up, on a face, which i can also do but don't know how

4.14.21  6:19 pm   what's a dunce

      i have no idea

4.14.21  5:46 pm   favourite mode of transport?

      already being there

4.14.21  5:26 pm   how was your vacation in the middle of the sun?

      average

4.14.21  5:19 pm   how do I work with my limitations? (for example, 24 keys keyboard)

      get crazy with the octave switcher buttons

4.14.21  5:09 pm   Are all of your videos going to be 3d from now on?

     no

     When do you think you will create a 2d one?

     last week

4.14.21  4:42 pm   What is your favourite song from all the songs you have made?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

4.14.21  4:37 pm   If I'm in the key of C, what should I call a D major chord? Major II? It's one of my favorite chords to go to and I can't find a succinct / technical term to refer to it

      2 major

4.14.21  3:08 pm   Is this video going to be an ambitious return to 2D animation?

      yes

4.14.21  2:08 pm   when will you post another note in the notebook section?

      just did

4.14.21  1:30 pm   why dont you use capital letters

      i do, but why don't you

4.14.21  1:13 pm   These teasers are looking pretty 2D. What do you think the 2D to 3D ratio is gonna be on this next video?

      80:20

4.14.21  12:06 pm   I've noticed in some of the videos you've put online you're in a room with words all over the walls. Could you tell me about that?

     it was there before i got there

     What did the words say?

      it's a lot of famous inspirational quotes. a lot of church leaders, a lot of entrepreneurs, famous influential people, winston churchill must be there, steve jobs, bill gates, mother theresa, desmond tutu, jesus is on there somewhere, i'm sure henry ford is there, ghandi must be there, there's probably about 300 of them. they cover the entire walls
